TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 提供焦點變更事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
The child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]物件 UI 自動化用戶端可以使用連結的識別項至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得收到焦點之物件的子 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] 識別項。

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]是識別類別目錄的應用程式中的可存取物件的 32 位元值。Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]用戶端可以使用連結至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得產生事件之 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 物件的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: 取得收到焦點之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] 項目的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: 可能的值，請參閱[物件識別元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp)Microsoft Active Accessibility 文件中。

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]是識別類別目錄的應用程式中的可存取物件的 32 位元值。Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]用戶端可以使用連結至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
